en.T1: POP BUBBLES BY MATCHING 3 OR MORE OF THE SAME COLOR
en.T2: COMPLETE THE HARVEST BY REMOVING ALL BUBBLES SURROUNDING THE ORANGE
en.T3: DON'T LET THE BUBBLES REACH THE RED LINE!
en.STAND.DESC: Second hand bargain! Looks a little worn and isn't much of a customer magnet, but kind of gets the job done.
en.STAND2.DESC: Fresh and sturdy roadside stand. Looks attractive and gives a sense of quality to everything you sell.
en.STAND3.DESC: Extreme quality. Beautiful design. Will attract quite a crowd and allows you to charge premium prices.
en.OTREE.DESC: Small and cheap orange tree. Yields one orange per harvest.
en.OTREE2.DESC: Medium size orange tree. Yields two oranges per harvest.
en.OTREE3.DESC: This tree variety has been bred for increased crop sizes. Yields three oranges per harvest.
en.OTREE4.DESC: This rare, extreme yield breed with origins in Brazil yields four oranges per harvest.
en.JUICER.DESC: Juice maker for small scale and home use. Produces one bottle of juice out of 2 oranges.
en.JUICER2.DESC: Produce juice at scale! Quick turnaround, handles large bursts of fruits. Produces one bottle of juice out of 2 oranges.
en.ICECREAMMAKER.DESC: For small vendors just starting out. Produces one ice cream out of one bottle of juice.
en.ICECREAMMAKER2.DESC: Heavy duty ice cream maker. Produces one ice cream out of one bottle of juice.
en.MOVE.OVERLAP: MAKE SURE IT IS NOT OVERLAPPING OTHER OBJECTS
en.CANNOT_RECYCLE.TREE: You need at least one orange tree.
en.CANNOT_RECYCLE.STAND: You need at least one sales stand.
en.OPTIONS.RESET.CONFIRM: All progress will be lost. Are you sure?
en.MESSAGE.WELCOME.TEXT:
This is your garden. Your very own orange ranch!

Why don't you get started by picking some oranges?
en.MESSAGE.SHOP.TEXT:
Looks like you were born to pick oranges.

Lets add more trees, it will get you more oranges per harvest!
en.MESSAGE.BOOSTERS.TEXT:
We loaded up a couple of AIM-AID boosters to help you with those near impossible shots.

You will find them by pressing the button with the lightning flash!
en.MESSAGE.JUICER.TEXT:
The Juice Maker Mini is now available in the shop.

Sweet, refreshing and locally produced juice
- your customers will love it!
en.MESSAGE.ICECREAMMAKER.TEXT:
There is nothing like fresh ice cream on a hot summer day!

The Ice Cream Maker is now available in the shop.
en.MESSAGE.MATCHANY.TEXT:
Hey, I had some WILDCARD boosters lying around. They make your bubble match any color.

Find them by pressing the button with the lightning flash!
en.MESSAGE.BOOSTERSHOP.TEXT:
Make sure you always have a few boosters ready in case you need them.

You can stock up in the newly opened Booster Shop!
en.MESSAGE.JUICER2.TEXT:
Ready to get serious with your juice and ice cream production?

You can now find industrial grade processing equipment in the shop.
en.MESSAGE.OTREE4.TEXT:
Get even more oranges from every harvest!

The Extreme Yield Orange Tree is now available in the shop.
en.MESSAGE.STAND3.TEXT: Increase the rate of sales and get more for your produce with an exclusive designer stand.
en.MESSAGE.GIFT_AIM.TEXT:
Maybe you have use for another AIM-AID booster?

Enjoy!
en.MESSAGE.GIFT_MATCHANY.TEXT:
Hey,
I thought you might like to have another
WILDCARD booster, so here you go!
